name: Indicia
tagline: Bristol Konica Minolta Marketing Services Company
description:
We find ways to inspire, inform and engage your audience, creating valuable brand relationships that last long after the initial sale. 
Our teams work together to turn factual insights into award-winning ideas and campaigns. Our entrepreneurial way of working sparks creativity and innovation. We strive for huge leaps in ideas to deliver work our clients truly believe in.
Plus, with our passion for new technology, there’s even more ways we can help you tell your brand stories.
